institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 33 (Competition Types and Quotas)
contents: Article 33 (Types of competition and quota) ① The types of competitions and divisions conducted in domestic competitions are as shown in Table 4. ② The quota of players participating in domestic competitions is determined by stadium, type, and capacity of players in local competitions. The chairperson of the city/provincial committee and the president of the national competition shall determine, but if the number of applicants exceeds the quota (stadium capacity), the city/provincial chairperson of the local competition and the chairman of the national competition shall establish separate standards to select participating players. You can.
